FuncDef: The display isis traffic-eng statistics command displays TE statistics of IS-IS.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an IS-IS process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays TE statistics of a specified VPN instance to which an IS-IS process belongs.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: ISIS Level-1 Traffic Engineering Status    : Enabled
ISIS Level-2 Traffic Engineering Status    : Enabled
ISIS Level-1 IPv6 Traffic Engineering Status    : Disabled
ISIS Level-2 IPv6 Traffic Engineering Status    : Disabled
ISIS Level-1 Metric Delay Status           : Enabled
ISIS Level-2 Metric Delay Status           : Enabled
ISIS Level-1 IPv6 Metric Delay Status      : Disabled
ISIS Level-2 IPv6 Metric Delay Status      : Disabled
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view TE statistics of IS-IS, run the display isis traffic-eng statistics command.
